question.title: How to get Japanese values from application.yaml
question.body:
I have a YAML file like this:

customer:
  vote:
    people:
      vote-order:
        1:
          id: 3
          name: "社長様"
        2:
          id: 4
          name: "会長様"
        3:
          id: 7
          name: "english_value"

I've made a vote order like this to get values from this

@Configuration
@ConfigurationProperties(prefix = "customer.vote.people")
public class VoteOrder {

    private Map<Integer, Voter> voteOrder;

    public Map<Integer, Voter> getVoteOrder() {
        return voteOrder;
    }

    public void setVoteOrder(Map<Integer, Voter> voteOrder) {
        this.voteOrder = voteOrder;
    }

    public static class Voter {
        private int id;
        private String name;

        public int getId() {
            return id;
        }

        public void setId(int id) {
            this.id = id;
        }

        public String getName() {
            return name;
        }

        public void setName(String name) {
            this.name = name;
        }
    }
}

I'm in a weird situation now. I've called value like this: Map<Integer, VoteOrder.Voter> peoples = voteOrder.getVoteOrder();

I can get values for 3, using peoples.get(3) I can get name and id, but when I do peoples.get(2) or peoples.get(1), I get id, but for name I get this value ??? ???

I tried to search using VM options, putting -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 or using @PropertySource(value = "classpath:application.yaml", encoding = "UTF-8"), but still I can't get Japanese characters from this YAML file.

Are there ways to get values?
